languages.text: The higher a character's Weapon Skill (WS) is compared to their opponent's, the easier it is for them to parry that opponent's attacks.
languages.original_text: Чем больше значение Ближнего Боя (ББ) у персонажа по сравнению с противником, тем проще ему парировать атаки этого противника.

traits.locale_text: The higher a character's Weapon Skill (WS) is compared to their opponent's, the easier it is for them to parry that opponent's attacks.
The higher a character's Weapon Skill (WS) is compared to their opponent's, the easier it is for them to parry that opponent's attacks.

languages.text: Cuanto mayor sea la Habilidad de armas (HA) de un personaje respecto a la de su oponente, más fácil le resultará parar los ataques del enemigo.
languages.original_text: The higher a character's Weapon Skill (WS) is compared to their opponent's, the easier it is for them to parry that opponent's attacks.

traits.locale_text: Cuanto mayor sea la Habilidad de armas (HA) de un personaje respecto a la de su oponente, más fácil le resultará parar los ataques del enemigo.

languages.text: 角色的武器技能越是比对手高，就越是容易招架对手的攻击。
languages.original_text: The higher a character's Weapon Skill (WS) is compared to their opponent's, the easier it is for them to parry that opponent's attacks.

traits.locale_text: 角色的武器技能越是比对手高，就越是容易招架对手的攻击。

languages.text: キャラクターの武器スキル（WS）が相手より高ければ高いほど、相手の攻撃を受け流しやすくなる。
languages.original_text: The higher a character's Weapon Skill (WS) is compared to their opponent's, the easier it is for them to parry that opponent's attacks.

traits.locale_text: キャラクターの武器スキル（WS）が相手より高ければ高いほど、相手の攻撃を受け流しやすくなる。

languages.text: Je höher die Waffenfähigkeit (WF) eines Charakters im Vergleich zu der seines Gegners ist, desto leichter kann er die Angriffe des Gegners parieren.
languages.original_text: The higher a character's Weapon Skill (WS) is compared to their opponent's, the easier it is for them to parry that opponent's attacks.

traits.locale_text: Je höher die Waffenfähigkeit (WF) eines Charakters im Vergleich zu der seines Gegners ist, desto leichter kann er die Angriffe des Gegners parieren.

languages.text: Plus la Capacité de combat (CC) d'un personnage est élevée par rapport à celle de son adversaire, plus il est facile pour lui de parer ses attaques.

languages.text: Bir karakterin Silah Yeteneği (SİY) düşmanınkine kıyasla ne kadar yüksekse o düşmanın saldırılarını savuşturmak da o kadar kolay olur.
